alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jasper and western Clarke Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rose Hill, or 15 miles south of Newton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rose Hill and Paulding around 435 PM CDT. Orange around 455 PM CDT. Pachuta and Barnett around 505 PM CDT. Stonewall around 515 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
